actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to adjust target prices established under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended, for the 1975 through 1977 crops of wheat and feed grains to reflect changes in farm production costs and yields.

summary.text: Provides for the adjustment of target prices established under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended, for the 1975 through 1977 crops of wheat and feed grains to reflect changes in farm production costs and yields.

titles.title: A bill to adjust target prices established under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended, for the 1975 through 1977 crops of wheat and feed grains to reflect changes in farm production costs and yields.
